summary: The diff implements most requirements: REQ-1 (surgeryReport default removed), REQ-2 (Daily Summary task added to checklist, backend, CSV, IconDailySummary component), REQ-4 (IconHisto microscope SVG), REQ-5 (IconSurgery scalpel SVG), REQ-6 (IconCulture petri dish SVG). However, REQ-3 (Dashboard toggle button) shows no evidence of implementation in DashboardView.tsx, and WorkflowIcon.tsx wiring for dailySummary is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a toggle button to the Dashboard page (DashboardView.tsx) that switches between the Weekly Calendar view and the Card Grid view. The toggle should be visible in the dashboard header/controls area. Persist the selected view mode in component state.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to DashboardView.tsx appear in the diff. No toggle button component or view-mode state management is evidenced anywhere in the modified files.

missing_requirements.requirement: The WorkflowIcon dispatcher (WorkflowIcon.tsx) maps the dailySummary type to an IconDailySummary component.
missing_requirements.reason: WorkflowIcon.tsx is not listed among the modified files in the diff. There is no evidence that the dispatcher was updated to map dailySummary to IconDailySummary.
